DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness ReJoinTM Knee Osteoarthritis patient Cartilage Defects compare Sodium Hyaluronate Injection .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Compare ReJoinTM Sodium Hyaluronate Injection Knee Osteoarthritis Cartilage Defects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , single-blind , parallel group , phase II clinical trial . 28 subject clinical diagnosis knee osteoarthritis cartilage defect randomly distribute 2:1 treatment group control group sign ICF screen tests.The treatment accept ReJoinTM first fourth week , Sodium Hyaluronate Injection second third week.The control group accept Sodium Hyaluronate Injection weekly , four injection total.The duration therapy 48 week .
DOC.criteria: 1870 year old , KOA couse ≤ 10 year KellgrenLawrence ⅠⅢ VAS core ＞6， 4 month Signed informed consent subject cartilage defect 26cm2 Pregnancy test positive . Subject infected hepatitis C , HIV syphilis . Subject enrol cell therapy study within past 30 day . Subject deem suitable study investigator
